means: （沿缓坡而下的）徐缓黏滞泥流，泥流

sentence.Network_en: Several had escaped the mudslide by running to higher ground.
sentence.Network_cn: 有几人因及时跑到地势较高的地区从而免遭泥石流掩埋.

sentence.Network_en: In the disaster area, more than 200 relief workers were reported buried in a mudslide.
sentence.Network_cn: 据报道,在灾区, 200多名救援工作者被埋在一个泥石流里.

entry.def: A mudslide is a large amount of mud sliding down a mountain, usually causing damage or destruction.

auth_sentence.content: Xinhua said it was the deadliest mudslide to hit China in decades.
